results.title: Amazon Pulls Out of Planned New York City Headquarters

results.title: What to Say (and What Not to Say) to Someone Who’s Grieving
results.abstract: A little empathy goes a long way, especially when someone is recovering from the loss of a loved one. Unfortunately, even when some of us mean well, we make the situation worse. Here’s how to avoid it.
